package com.demo;

public class LAB_4 {

	public static void main(String[] args) {
		// TODO Auto-generated method stub
		int s1 = 68;
		int s2 = 90;
		int s3 = 40;
		int s4 = 59;
		int s5 = 60;
		int total = (s1+s2+s3+s4+s5);
		float p = (float)total;                  
	     float percentage = (float) ((p/500.0)*100.0);
	     
	     System.out.println("Percentage : "+ percentage);   
		
		System.out.println("Total: "+total);

	}

}
